title: Scan and Dock Task can produce unsolvable scenarios

content.raw:
Running the Scan and Dock task \(a or b\) always creates a dock with two bays, both of which are marked with a blue circle. Therefore, no matter what shape or sequence is received, it is impossible to know which bay is correct. At minimum, our example should default to a dock with different symbols on it. If we want to offer the ability to generate a scenario at random, a dock should not be able to choose the same color / shape combination for multiple bays.

In addition, when running version A of this task, the plugin always announces the correct dock as “red\_circle” \(which does not match the placard of the correct dock\). This could be easily fixed by editing the “announce symbol” in the xacro file, but it would be better if the announce symbol were red from the actual symbol on the bay, since this would prevent the system from “lying” about its symbol.
